description:
OK, Billy is just fucking hot. That's all there is to it.
Ever since we posted his first video, we've been getting a ton of e-mail saying "We want to see Billy get fucked!"
Billy is kind of shy so, of course, I had to give him a hard time about it.
"Man, there is an army of people out there who want to see you get fucked!" I told him.
"Yeah?" he said. He smiled and never quite made eye contact. Rodney was sitting next to him.
"You're going to make a lot of people happy with what you're about to do to him," I said to Rodney.
Rodney laughed and looked at Billy.
"Are you excited to get your dick up his ass?" I asked Rodney.
"Yeah, I think it will be fun," he said.
Rodney was looking better than I had ever seen him. He was totally ripped, with muscles bulging everywhere.
To say that Billy enjoyed the fucking that Rodney gave him would be an understatement. He fucking loved it!
title: Billy & Rodney
